Incognito Mode Shortcut

Press Ctrl+Shift+N in Chrome to open a new Incognito window.

Browser

Overview

Open an Incognito or Private browsing window instantly using keyboard shortcuts across different browsers.

Browser Shortcuts

  • Google Chrome Ctrl+Shift+N (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+N (Mac)
  • Mozilla Firefox Ctrl+Shift+P (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+P (Mac)
  • Microsoft Edge Ctrl+Shift+N (Windows) or Cmd+Shift+N (Mac)
  • Safari Cmd+Shift+N (Mac)

Benefits of Incognito Mode

  • Browse without saving history
  • Websites can't track you with cookies
  • Test websites without cache
  • Sign in to multiple accounts simultaneously
